AT.name: Momonga Pinball Adventures
AT.description: IT’S TIME TO ROLL Momonga is a unique pinball game, where you bounce through different worlds. On the way, you team up with friends to defeat enemies and conquer bossfights. A little flying squirrel takes on the forces of evil - join Momo, Panda and Fry in a quest to save the momongas from the claws of the evil owls. NOT YOUR AVERAGE PINBALL Momonga Pinball Adventures is a different kind of pinball. Instead of regular cabinets, you bounce a flying squirrel through different levels. Enemies, boss fights, exploration - it has all the ingredients of good old action-adventure games, but with flippers :) AN EPIC ADVENTURE Join Momo in the first episode of an epic adventure to save his tribe. One day, evil owls turned the momonga village to ashes. They took the momonga tribe and vanished. Only one momonga got away: young Momo barely survived the attack, and was left for dead. After the raid, Momo was found by a panda in the outskirts of the village. A scar went deep from the top of his head to the tip of his tail. The panda brought him to his sanctuary to heal his wounds. This is where the story begins. Help Momo face the owls and free his tribe.

movies.name: Momonga Pinball Adventures Trailer zum Verkaufsstart

BG.name: Momonga Pinball Adventures
BG.description: IT’S TIME TO ROLL Momonga is a unique pinball game, where you bounce through different worlds. On the way, you team up with friends to defeat enemies and conquer bossfights. A little flying squirrel takes on the forces of evil - join Momo, Panda and Fry in a quest to save the momongas from the claws of the evil owls. NOT YOUR AVERAGE PINBALL Momonga Pinball Adventures is a different kind of pinball. Instead of regular cabinets, you bounce a flying squirrel through different levels. After the raid, Momo was found by a panda in the outskirts of the village. A scar went deep from the top of his head to the tip of his tail. The panda brought him to his sanctuary to heal his wounds. This is where the story begins. Help Momo face the owls and free his tribe.

BE.name: Momonga Pinball Adventures
BE.description: IL EST TEMPS DE ROULER Momonga est un jeu de flipper unique qui vous fait rebondir à travers les différentes régions d’un monde : rencontrez des alliés, affrontez des ennemis et faites face à un ensemble de boss ! Un petit écureuil volant contre les forces du mal : rejoignez Momo, Panda et Fry dans leur quête pour sauver le peuple momonga des griffes de hiboux malfaisants ! UN JEU DE FLIPPER... QUI SORT DE L’ORDINAIRE Oubliez les expériences de flipper classiques. Dans Momonga Pinball Adventures, vous faites rebondir un écureuil volant à travers de véritables niveaux ! Ennemis, boss, exploration - tous les éléments d’un bon vieux jeu d’action-aventure, en version flipper. UNE AVENTURE ẾPIQUE Tout commence lorsque des hiboux malfaisants attaquent le village des momongas et disparaissent en emportant la tribu. Laissé pour mort, le jeune Momo est trouvé aux abords du village par un panda qui l’emmène dans son sanctuaire et soigne ses blessures. Une fois rétabli, marqué d’une cicatrice courant du sommet de son crâne jusqu’au bout de sa queue, Momo se lance sur les traces des hiboux… Ainsi commence l’histoire : Aidez Momo à affronter les hiboux et à retrouver sa tribu dans ce premier épisode de Momonga Pinball Adventures !

movies.name: Momonga Pinball Adventures bande-annonce de lancement

Enemies, boss fights, exploration - it has all the ingredients of good old action-adventure games, but with flippers :) AN EPIC ADVENTURE Join Momo in the first episode of an epic adventure to save his tribe. One day, evil owls turned the momonga village to ashes. They took the momonga tribe and vanished. Only one momonga got away: young Momo barely survived the attack, and was left for dead. After the raid, Momo was found by a panda in the outskirts of the village. A scar went deep from the top of his head to the tip of his tail. The panda brought him to his sanctuary to heal his wounds. This is where the story begins. Help Momo face the owls and free his tribe.
